title: #92Noon! Russo/Irmen/PP/Lavelle/Tomlinson
description: Emergency Russo after the Wild were battered in Colorado, then former Gophers hockey player Danny Irmen is on to discuss college puck and the tourney, you'll hear from new Vikings CB Patrick Peterson, Lavelle's weekly appearance, then hear PA's chat with DT Dalvin Tomlinson!
itunes:summary: Emergency Russo after the Wild were battered in Colorado, then former Gophers hockey player Danny Irmen is on to discuss college puck and the tourney, you'll hear from new Vikings CB Patrick Peterson, Lavelle's weekly appearance, then hear PA's chat with DT Dalvin Tomlinson!
